newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: માત્ર 2700 રૂપિયા માટે શુભમન ગિલ કોની સામે લડ્યો? ઓસ્ટ્રેલિયામાં ફન ગેમ, જુઓ વીડિયો
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: ઓસ્ટ્રેલિયા સામેની ડે-નાઈટ ટેસ્ટ મેચ પહેલા ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાની પ્રાઈમ મિનિસ્ટર ઈલેવન સામેની પ્રેક્ટિસ મેચનો પ્રથમ દિવસ વરસાદને કારણે ધોવાઈ ગયો હતો. જ્યારે બધા રમત શરૂ થવાની રાહ જોઈ રહ્યા હતા, ત્યારે શુભમન ગિલ પણ પ્રેક્ટિસ કરતી વખતે મસ્તી કરી રહ્યો હતો.

newsArray.title: ಮಂಡಳಿ ವಿರುದ್ಧವೇ ಕಾನೂನು ಹೋರಾಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸಜ್ಜಾದ ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗರು
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: England Cricket: ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗರು ತಮ್ಮದೇ ಮಂಡಳಿಯ ವಿರುದ್ಧ ಕಾನೂನು ಹೋರಾಟಕ್ಕಿಳಿಯಲು ಸಜ್ಜಾಗಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇದರಿಂದ ದೊಡ್ಡ ವಿವಾದವೇ ಎದ್ದಿದೆ. ವಾಸ್ತವವಾಗಿ, ಇಸಿಬಿ ಇತ್ತೀಚೆಗೆ ತನ್ನ ಆಟಗಾರರಿಗಾಗಿ ಹೊಸ ನೀತಿಯನ್ನು ಹೊರಡಿಸಿದೆ. ಈ ಹೊಸ ನೀತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನ ಸೂಪರ್ ಲೀಗ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಆಡದಂತೆ ತಂಡದ ಆಟಗಾರರಿಗೆ ನಿಷೇಧ ವಿಧಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದೀಗ ಆಟಗಾರರು ಈ ನಿರ್ಧಾರವನ್ನು ವಿರೋಧಿಸಿ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಹೆಜ್ಜೆ ಇಡಲು ನಿರ್ಧರಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: बॉर्डर-गावस्कर ट्रॉफीमध्ये रोहित शर्माची आतापर्यंतची कशी आहे कामगिरी? वाचा एका क्लिकवर 'हिटमॅन'ची आकडेवारी
newsArray.description: टीम इंडियाला या मालिकेतील दुसरा सामना 6 डिसेंबरपासून ॲडलेडच्या मैदानावर खेळायचा आहे, जो गुलाबी चेंडूने खेळवला जाईल. या सामन्यापूर्वी भारतीय संघासाठी आनंदाची बातमी म्हणजे रोहित शर्माचा संघात समावेश झाला असून तो मालिकेतील उर्वरित सामन्यांमध्ये कर्णधारपदाची जबाबदारी सांभाळताना दिसणार आहे.

newsArray.title: Not Virat Or Rohit! Cheteshwar Pujara Names Two India Legends For Whom 'They Are No Actual Replacements'
creator: Aayush Kataria
newsArray.description: Cheteshwar Pujara made a bold claim and stated that India will struggle to replace the veteran duo amid talks of a transition in the Test team. India left out both Ravichandran Ashwin and Ravindra Jadeja from the playing XI for the 295-run victory in the Perth Test in what was their first assignment post the 3-0 series defeat against New Zealand at home. The long-term future of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli has been questioned.

newsArray.title: BCCI Shares Video Of Shubman Gill And Abhishek Nayar's Epic Fielding Duel - WATCH
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Shubman Gill viral video: Shubman Gill and India's assistant coach Abhishek Nayar were seen in a lighthearted moment in a video shared by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) on their social media platforms.Gill, set to return for IND vs AUS 2nd Test in Adelaide after missing the BGT series opener due to a thumb injury, took part in a fun fielding drill alongside Nayar. The activity took place after Day 1 of India's practice match against Prime Minister's XI, which was washed out due to rain.Also on ABP Live | Pakistan Agrees To Hybrid Model For Champions Trophy 2025, But Sets One ConditionWatch viral video of Shubman Gill's epic duel with Abhishek Nayar ahead of IND vs AUS 2nd Test in Adelaide View this post on Instagram A post shared by Team India (@indiancricketteam)The opening day of the practice match between India and Australia in Canberra, today (November 30, was washed out due to rain. However, the teams are set to play a 50-over per side match tomorrow (December 1). All eyes will be on whether Shubman Gill participates in the game, as fans eagerly await his return to action.IND vs AUS 2nd Test, a day-night (pink-ball) match, is set to take place in Adelaide from December 6. Shubman Gill, who missed the Perth Test due to a thumb injury, has returned to practice and is expected to be available for selection in playing XI. He faced Yash Dayal and Akash Deep in the nets, indicating his readiness for Adelaide clash.There's speculation that Gill might be asked to bat into the middle order rather than the usual opening position. With KL Rahul scoring ton at the top in Rohit Sharma's absence, the likely combination could see Rohit and Yashasvi Jaiswal opening, Rahul moving to number three, and Gill taking the number five spot with Virat Kohli at number 4.After winning the BGT series opener, India have a 1-0 lead in five-Test series.

newsArray.title: IND vs PAK: చేతులెత్తేసిన బ్యాటర్లు.. పాక్ చేతిలో పోరాడి ఓడిన టీమిండియా
creator: Basha Shek
newsArray.description: UAE వేదికగా జరిగిన U19 ఆసియా కప్ మ్యాచ్‌లో భారత జట్టుకు పేలవమైన ఆరంభం లభించింది. శనివారం (నవంబర్ 30)పాకిస్థాన్‌తో జరిగిన మ్యాచ్ లో భారత్ 43 పరుగుల తేడాతో ఓడిపోయింది. పాక్‌ నిర్దేశించిన 281 పరుగుల లక్ష్యాన్ని ఛేదించేందుకు బరిలోకి దిగిన యువ భారత్ కేవలం 238 పరుగులకే పరిమితమైంది.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: માત્ર 2700 રૂપિયા માટે શુભમન ગિલ કોની સામે લડ્યો? ઓસ્ટ્રેલિયામાં ફન ગેમ, જુઓ વીડિયો
creator: Smit Chauhan
newsArray.description: ઓસ્ટ્રેલિયા સામેની ડે-નાઈટ ટેસ્ટ મેચ પહેલા ટીમ ઈન્ડિયાની પ્રાઈમ મિનિસ્ટર ઈલેવન સામેની પ્રેક્ટિસ મેચનો પ્રથમ દિવસ વરસાદને કારણે ધોવાઈ ગયો હતો. જ્યારે બધા રમત શરૂ થવાની રાહ જોઈ રહ્યા હતા, ત્યારે શુભમન ગિલ પણ પ્રેક્ટિસ કરતી વખતે મસ્તી કરી રહ્યો હતો.

newsArray.title: ಮಂಡಳಿ ವಿರುದ್ಧವೇ ಕಾನೂನು ಹೋರಾಟಕ್ಕೆ ಸಜ್ಜಾದ ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗರು
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: England Cricket: ಇಂಗ್ಲೆಂಡ್ ಕ್ರಿಕೆಟಿಗರು ತಮ್ಮದೇ ಮಂಡಳಿಯ ವಿರುದ್ಧ ಕಾನೂನು ಹೋರಾಟಕ್ಕಿಳಿಯಲು ಸಜ್ಜಾಗಿದ್ದಾರೆ. ಇದರಿಂದ ದೊಡ್ಡ ವಿವಾದವೇ ಎದ್ದಿದೆ. ವಾಸ್ತವವಾಗಿ, ಇಸಿಬಿ ಇತ್ತೀಚೆಗೆ ತನ್ನ ಆಟಗಾರರಿಗಾಗಿ ಹೊಸ ನೀತಿಯನ್ನು ಹೊರಡಿಸಿದೆ. ಈ ಹೊಸ ನೀತಿಯಲ್ಲಿ ಪಾಕಿಸ್ತಾನ ಸೂಪರ್ ಲೀಗ್‌ನಲ್ಲಿ ಆಡದಂತೆ ತಂಡದ ಆಟಗಾರರಿಗೆ ನಿಷೇಧ ವಿಧಿಸಲಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದೀಗ ಆಟಗಾರರು ಈ ನಿರ್ಧಾರವನ್ನು ವಿರೋಧಿಸಿ ದೊಡ್ಡ ಹೆಜ್ಜೆ ಇಡಲು ನಿರ್ಧರಿಸಿದ್ದಾರೆ.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: बॉर्डर-गावस्कर ट्रॉफीमध्ये रोहित शर्माची आतापर्यंतची कशी आहे कामगिरी? वाचा एका क्लिकवर 'हिटमॅन'ची आकडेवारी
newsArray.description: टीम इंडियाला या मालिकेतील दुसरा सामना 6 डिसेंबरपासून ॲडलेडच्या मैदानावर खेळायचा आहे, जो गुलाबी चेंडूने खेळवला जाईल. या सामन्यापूर्वी भारतीय संघासाठी आनंदाची बातमी म्हणजे रोहित शर्माचा संघात समावेश झाला असून तो मालिकेतील उर्वरित सामन्यांमध्ये कर्णधारपदाची जबाबदारी सांभाळताना दिसणार आहे.

newsArray.title: Not Virat Or Rohit! Cheteshwar Pujara Names Two India Legends For Whom 'They Are No Actual Replacements'
creator: Aayush Kataria
newsArray.description: Cheteshwar Pujara made a bold claim and stated that India will struggle to replace the veteran duo amid talks of a transition in the Test team. India left out both Ravichandran Ashwin and Ravindra Jadeja from the playing XI for the 295-run victory in the Perth Test in what was their first assignment post the 3-0 series defeat against New Zealand at home. The long-term future of Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli has been questioned.

newsArray.title: BCCI Shares Video Of Shubman Gill And Abhishek Nayar's Epic Fielding Duel - WATCH
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: Shubman Gill viral video: Shubman Gill and India's assistant coach Abhishek Nayar were seen in a lighthearted moment in a video shared by the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) on their social media platforms.Gill, set to return for IND vs AUS 2nd Test in Adelaide after missing the BGT series opener due to a thumb injury, took part in a fun fielding drill alongside Nayar. The activity took place after Day 1 of India's practice match against Prime Minister's XI, which was washed out due to rain.Also on ABP Live | Pakistan Agrees To Hybrid Model For Champions Trophy 2025, But Sets One ConditionWatch viral video of Shubman Gill's epic duel with Abhishek Nayar ahead of IND vs AUS 2nd Test in Adelaide View this post on Instagram A post shared by Team India (@indiancricketteam)The opening day of the practice match between India and Australia in Canberra, today (November 30, was washed out due to rain. However, the teams are set to play a 50-over per side match tomorrow (December 1). All eyes will be on whether Shubman Gill participates in the game, as fans eagerly await his return to action.IND vs AUS 2nd Test, a day-night (pink-ball) match, is set to take place in Adelaide from December 6. Shubman Gill, who missed the Perth Test due to a thumb injury, has returned to practice and is expected to be available for selection in playing XI. He faced Yash Dayal and Akash Deep in the nets, indicating his readiness for Adelaide clash.There's speculation that Gill might be asked to bat into the middle order rather than the usual opening position. With KL Rahul scoring ton at the top in Rohit Sharma's absence, the likely combination could see Rohit and Yashasvi Jaiswal opening, Rahul moving to number three, and Gill taking the number five spot with Virat Kohli at number 4.After winning the BGT series opener, India have a 1-0 lead in five-Test series.

newsArray.title: IND vs PAK: చేతులెత్తేసిన బ్యాటర్లు.. పాక్ చేతిలో పోరాడి ఓడిన టీమిండియా
creator: Basha Shek
newsArray.description: UAE వేదికగా జరిగిన U19 ఆసియా కప్ మ్యాచ్‌లో భారత జట్టుకు పేలవమైన ఆరంభం లభించింది. శనివారం (నవంబర్ 30)పాకిస్థాన్‌తో జరిగిన మ్యాచ్ లో భారత్ 43 పరుగుల తేడాతో ఓడిపోయింది. పాక్‌ నిర్దేశించిన 281 పరుగుల లక్ష్యాన్ని ఛేదించేందుకు బరిలోకి దిగిన యువ భారత్ కేవలం 238 పరుగులకే పరిమితమైంది.
